title: A Case NOT Suitable for Air Cooling? Lian Li O11 AIR
description: One of this year's most-anticipated cases is Lian Li's PC-O11 AIR, a great looking computer case that's supposed to be optimized for air cooling.  But is it?  Our testing finds some issues with Lian Li's claims despite this being an amazing home for your PC gaming components.     Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Toshiba RC100:    COMPONENTS IN AIRFLOW BUILD:  i7-8700K:  ttp://geni.us/8700k Cryorig H7:   Noctua NF-A12 Fans:   G.Skill Trident-Z:   ASUS Z370-A Motherboard:   CableMod Extension Cables:   CableMod Cable Combs:   Enermax TB RGB Fans:  BeQuiet Pure Rock:     Newegg Affiliate Links for PC-O11 Air Pre Order:  PC-O11 Air:   PC-O11 Air / RGB Fans:     Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Lian Li. This video is sponsored by Toshiba. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.  As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #lianli011air #hardwarecanucks
